definitions: Something that pops up or can be popped up.
A book or card containing three-dimensional illustrations that pop up when the page or card is opened.
A window that suddenly appears on a computer screen, especially one generated for advertising.
A temporary retail store or restaurant that is set up in a vacant space for a short period.
examples: The pop-up on the website was annoying.
She bought a pop-up book for her niece.
They visited a pop-up art gallery.
The pop-up ad covered the content.
